SEARCH
Package grafiosch.gtnet

Class GTNetModelHelper

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.gtnet.GTNetModelHelper
public abstract class GTNetModelHelper extends Object
Central registry mapping GTNet message codes to their payload model classes and metadata. This class serves two primary purposes:
  1. Form Generation: Provides model class metadata to the frontend via getAllFormDefinitionsWithClass(), enabling dynamic form generation for each message type
  2. Message Processing: Maps incoming message codes to their expected payload model class via getMsgClassByMessageCode(GTNetMessageCode)

Core vs Application-Specific Messages

Core protocol messages (0-54) are registered in the static block using GNetCoreMessageCode. Application-specific messages (60+) should be registered via registerModel(grafiosch.gtnet.GTNetMessageCode, java.lang.Class<?>, boolean, byte) at application startup, typically in a @PostConstruct method.

Naming Conventions

Message code names follow patterns that indicate behavior:
  • _C suffix: Client-initiated, shown in UI for user selection
  • _S suffix: Server response, not shown in UI initiation dialogs
  • _ALL_ contains: Broadcast to multiple recipients
  • _SEL_ contains: Targeted at a selected single recipient
See Also:
  • for core protocol message codes
  • for message storage
  • for adding application-specific messages at startup

  • Method Details

    • registerModel

      public static void registerModel(GTNetMessageCode messageCode, Class<?> model, boolean responseExpected, byte repeatSendAsMany)
      Registers an application-specific message model at application startup. This method allows application modules to register their own message codes (60+) without modifying this base class. Call this from a @PostConstruct method in your startup component.
      Parameters:
      messageCode - the message code to register
      model - the model class (can be null for messages with no payload)
      responseExpected - true if sender should wait for a response
      repeatSendAsMany - retry count for delivery attempts

    • getAllFormDefinitionsWithClass

      public static Map<GTNetMessageCode,ClassDescriptorInputAndShow> getAllFormDefinitionsWithClass()
      Returns form definitions for all client-initiatable message types. Filters the registry to include only message codes ending with "_C" (client-initiated) that have a non-null model class. The returned map is consumed by the frontend to dynamically build input forms for each message type.
      Returns:
      map of message code to form descriptor, for use by GTNetMessageEditComponent

    • getMsgClassByMessageCode

      public static GTNetModelHelper.GTNetMsgRequest getMsgClassByMessageCode(GTNetMessageCode messageCode)
      Looks up the model class and response expectation for a given message code. Used during message processing to:
      • Deserialize incoming message parameters into the correct POJO
      • Determine whether to wait for a synchronous response
      Parameters:
      messageCode - the message code to look up
      Returns:
      the GTNetMsgRequest with model class and response flag, or null if not registered
